text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia virginica, common name the Virginia odostome,  is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell reaches a length of 2.7 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Virginia, USA
